title.label: Mega battery drain, too many ads

content.label: This is a good game, but I can‚Äôt recommend it because of two massive problems I originally rated this game 5 stars, but I‚Äôve lowered it to 2 for two reasons. Number 1: it used to just be ‚Äúwatch ads for bonuses‚Äù (such as to double coins or to save your run) but now there are unavoidable ads at unpredictable times. I now play this game with wifi and cell data turned off. Number 2: it is a MASSIVE battery drainer. I played it today for 10 minutes, and my battery went from 87% to 67%. And you can‚Äôt use Low Power Mode, because that makes the game extremely laggy. It‚Äôs unclear how it got this bad. Maybe it‚Äôs constantly checking for ads or selling my personal information? Maybe it suffers from spaghetti code? Whatever the cause, even though this game is fun, you shouldn‚Äôt download it until these two issues are fixed.

I love this game it‚Äôs addicting and fun to play and try and collect but lately have been running into issues where my game crashes and also crashes after I launch to play in the jungle and is getting frustrating.

title.label: The game has a suspension every minute that takes me out of the game

I‚Äôve already purchased three of the epic animals, deleted the game, and redownloaded it but I don‚Äôt have access to the animals.

I got this game because I thought it looked cute, THERES ALOT MORE TO IT THEN MUST THE GRAPHICS!!! Here the game is like a arcade game, you jump from one animal to another to get a new high score... but watch out!!! Don‚Äôt fall or get eaten or else you will have to start the game over. Now for more details the game is excellent, every new animal you catch goes to your zoo for example here are some of the animals I have captured: Giraffe, Gorilla, even I have caught a Vulture. While there are different types of animals there are more species that are rarer in the group. For example: one of my giraffes looks like a very very tall sheep. They are very funny designs and soo fun to collect. Another cool thing to do is collect different hats. I love customizing my character in this game. Its also cool to get new maps. Recently I got the jungle and I got all sorts of new animals!!!! Of you are looking for a game to play on free time check this out!!

This games is really fun. The concept is amazing. Everyone is annoyed by the ads, but that amount doesn‚Äôt bother me all that much. The thing annoying me is that the ads ALWAYS crash. It gets to be pretty annoying. If you could please fix this then I would definitely give this 5 stars.
This game is great but I wish there was a way to start over.
I would like dinosaurs in this game if there are sorry for asking but its a great game

The game overall is good aside from the too many ads thing. The bugs and glitches though, are overwhelming. The game frequently lags and buffers dropping in frame rate which makes the game unplayable sometimes. This happens while I am outside, but also happens even in my own house. Also, now whenever I do 1 round my game crashes and kicks me out which is hella annoying. The crashes brought it down 1 star on their own, otherwise it would be 2 stars. This game has way too many issues.

The only thing about this game is that I feel that they can do a lot more with it, not so much with the ‚Äúracing‚Äù or what ever you want to call it, but like maybe add different modes or more to do where you look at your animals you caught.

title.label: Take off the green screen record

content.label: I really like this game. I‚Äôm almost addicted. You may be wondering why did you give this game 4 stars. Well there is a screen recording in the top right corner of your screen. Doesn‚Äôt seem like a big problem at first but, it covers up you coins. With this problem, I have to guess how many coins I have. Some people don‚Äôt have this problem and they can see the coins perfectly fine. I don‚Äôt know why I have this problem. Sometimes I leave the game and come back on and the green screen recorder isn‚Äôt there and then I go to play and it pops back up. When I go back to my zoo, it‚Äôs back up again. In my opinion this would be very helpful. My brother even has the same problem. We are both on IOS. Please change this. Thank you, have a nice day and hopefully this will be fixed soon. :)

My son has been playing this game for a long time and really enjoys it. Recently, I found some inappropriate language in it, that a nine and below should not be hearing. The quote, ‚Äúthis one time at band camp‚Ä¶‚Äú was put in a description, about one of the animals. Now I have to explain to my young son what this means. I‚Äôm sure some of you will find this amusing. And I‚Äôm sure those of you who do, are not children. These comments either need to be removed or the age needs to be changed . This game should be for teens and above.

I love this game and have played for the past three years. I used to give it a five star rating but you guys recently filled it with adds. One of the reasons I liked the game was because there were no adds unless you want to watch one for a revive. I recommend you change or decrease the amount of adds. I also dislike the timing of adds, for example I was playing with the 
little energy I had in the Rome world and it makes me waist the run and energy by putting a 30 sec add on my screen during the run. This is not the first time either. I don‚Äôt mean to sound like a Karen but I feel like the game has become greedier and greedier over the  years and I am kind of tired of playing it because of this. Other than that though the game is fantastic!
I like this game but there are a few things that annoy me like I wish it was a little easier to get coins lol but other than that I love it and I play it all the time.

I just want to say that apps don‚Äôt stick around for me. I usually play it for as long as it‚Äôs fun, and then delete it.  That tells you that this game is good, because I got it years ago.  A great way to spend time, and unlocking all the animals has become so incredibly fun. 5 stars well deserved!

the game looks really simple, so I was surprised when it kept crashing and heating up my phone. now, every time I open the game it crashes during the title screen. I have enough storage to handle it, even deleted a few pictures from my phone to see if it would help. all my settings in the menu are off except for power saving mode. they both didn‚Äôt help. I dunno if this is because I still have an iPhone 7 or if this is just a game-wide problem, but I‚Äôd like it to be fixed. if it is because I have an earlier model I‚Äôd like there to be more settings to decrease the graphic quality or turn it on the lowest graphic settings when it does crash, because now i can‚Äôt even open the game. it‚Äôs a really fun game, just a shame I can‚Äôt play it anymore.
